description: As of now, we have a total of 4 styles for birthday i.e. Birthday Delight, Shimmer, Flicker and Birthday Album. You can preview these from the 'Birthday' category in the 'Styles' page.
title: How many birthday styles do you offer?
description_text: As of now, we have a total of 4 styles for birthday i.e. Birthday Delight, Shimmer, Flicker and Birthday Album. You can preview these from the 'Birthday' category in the 'Styles' page.

description: In the step to add the media, there is a button to 'Change Style' beside the 'Add Logo' button. Click on it and re-select a new style.
title: How to change the selected styles?
description_text: In the step to add the media, there is a button to 'Change Style' beside the 'Add Logo' button. Click on it and re-select a new style.

description: The styles you are selecting must be a premium or pro style. To unlock the styles, upgrade your account.
title: Why can't I select the style I want?
description_text: The styles you are selecting must be a premium or pro style. To unlock the styles, upgrade your account.

description: As for now, the users don't have the option to customize the Picovico video styles. If customization is required, they can request for a tailored API.
title: Can I customize picovico styles ?
description_text: As for now, the users don't have the option to customize the Picovico video styles. If customization is required, they can request for a tailored API.
